attributes.action: Strip Gary Barlow of his O.B.E.
attributes.additional_details: Strip tax avoider Gary Barlow of his O.B.E. He has avoided paying a reported £26m in taxes. Was he awarded the honour due to publicily supporting David Cameron and the Conservative Party at the last General Election? This 'morally wrong' avoidance    also brings concerns of credibility and shame to the Honours system.
